reviews.review_msg: On everyone's soul, he is the Goat. W prof, and W lectures. The notes had a lot of words but were useful.
Always willing to help. Can actually explain thing clearly. I personally DONT find the course easy at all!

This professor is very unorganized, he makes numerous mistakes in class in the lecture notes.  The notes are useless anyways as they make no sense when you go back and read them.  His midterms were pretty tough but the final exam was ridicously hard.  He is way too old and should retire.
